title: Babylon is fallen: pope Francis authorizes the World Economic Forum to rewrite the Bible
text:

It appears that antichrist pope Francis, who is a Jesuit, has asked the World Economic Forum to re-write the Bible. Why? There’s something about the Bible that triggers the pope. Could it be that he realizes that 2 Thessalonians 2:3-4 speaks about the office of the papacy while Revelation 17 & 18 speaks of his homo and pedo-led Babylonian Roman Catholic church?
